      • extractOneDataRequirements

        public Map<String,OneData> extractOneDataRequirements(alien4cloud.tosca.model.ArchiveRoot archiveRoot,
                                                      Map<String,Object> inputs)
        Description copied from interface: ToscaService
        Extracts OneData requirements (i.e. space, favorite providers, etc) from the TOSCA template.
        Specified by:
        extractOneDataRequirements in interface ToscaService
        Parameters:
        archiveRoot - an ArchiveRoot representing the template.
        inputs - the user's input list.
        Returns:
        a Map of OneData requirement, index by node name.
        WARNING: (TEMPORARY) currently OneData nodes are not supported; thus the name used are hard-coded and are either 'input', 'output' or 'service'.

      • setNodeCapability

        public void setNodeCapability(org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.templates.NodeTemplate node,
                              String typeCapability,
                              String nameCapability)
        Set a new capability at the specified node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to add the new capability
        typeCapability - the type of the capability
        nameCapability - the name of the capability
